channel.title: Electron on LLouice
channel.description: Recent content in Electron on LLouice

item.title: First
item.description: Bspline B-spline generator based on Electron and python 项目依赖安装 bootstrap bootstrap-switch jquery zeromq zerorpc zerorpc npm install git+https://github.com/fyears/zerorpc-node.git zerorpc zerorpc-node github zerorpc-python github zeromq Rebuilding for Electron before npm start npm rebuild zeromq --runtime=electron --target=1.8.4 zeromq for node.js devDependencies electron : ^1.8.4 electron-reload : ^2.2.1 打包 使用 Eelctron-Packager 进行打包 electron-packager . B-spline --overwrite --asar=true --ignore="bak" --ignore="pybspline" 由于 main.js 中
